# Code Formatter

This skill helps format code files according to project style guidelines.

## Usage

When asked to format code, this skill will:

1. Read the specified file
2. Apply consistent indentation (4 spaces for Python, 2 for JS/TS)
3. Remove trailing whitespace
4. Ensure consistent line endings

## Supported Languages

- Python
- JavaScript
- TypeScript
- JSON
- YAML
